did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Amanda Littauer and Laura Steele's European and American lesbian and gay ephemera, 1998.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Maps featuring gay-friendly locations and services; flyers, postcards, brochures, tabloids, and magazines featuring gay themes, in Italy, Spain, and Great Britain.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Amanda Littauer and Laura Steele gathered the collection on a trip to Europe following their commitment ceremony in Ithaca, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Maps featuring gay-friendly locations and services; flyers, postcards, brochures, tabloids, and magazines featuring gay themes, in Italy, Spain, and Great Britain.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: European and American lesbian and gay ephemera, #7635. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
